creator: jignesh75@indiatimes.com
text:
We are using FOP to render a PDF document on the fly. While trasnfoming to an 
output document it duplicates  some pages and also created blank pages in 
between others. When used errorListner to capture the errors and we got 
following errors while generating some of the pages.


Could not load external SVG: PAR012 For 
propertyID "http://xml.org/sax/properties/lexical-handler", the 
value "org.apache.batik.dom.svg.SAXSVGDocumentFactory@45ef8fb3" cannot be cast 
to LexicalHandler.
http://xml.org/sax/properties/lexical-handler
	org.apache.batik.dom.svg.SAXSVGDocumentFactory@45ef8fb3	LexicalHandler 
[9/18/03 16:05:24:061 EDT] 6fbb0f8d WebGroup      I SRVE0091I: [Servlet LOG]: 
ERROR   10639   [default ] (): Could not load external SVG: PAR012 For 
propertyID "http://xml.org/sax/properties/lexical-handler", the 
value "org.apache.batik.dom.svg.SAXSVGDocumentFactory@45ef8fb3" cannot be cast 
to LexicalHandler.
http://xml.org/sax/properties/lexical-handler
	org.apache.batik.dom.svg.SAXSVGDocumentFactory@45ef8fb3	LexicalHandler

It will be good help if you can tell us solution for this.

Thanks and Regards,

Jignesh Kapadia
jignesh.kapadia@us.michelin.com

Unwanted blank pages occured sometimes with FOP 0.20.5. no such report with 0.9x
versions.
Duplicate content can occur at XSLT stage, before FOP stage.
If anybody encounters such issues, feel free to reopen this bug.

In that case, please provide a FO file reproducing this issue.
creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
